title.narrative: Growth and Employment in States - Long Term Consultant

description.narrative: This activity (Growth and Employment in States - Long Term Consultant) is a component of Growth and Employment in States Programme (GEMS)- reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,563,829. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Industrial development, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, British High Commission - Nigeria, Coffey International Development, Ernst & Young Nigeria, PwC, World Bank, The. The start date is 10-09-2008 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
